channel.title: Need help with slayer!
channel.description: Well, my slayer is fine but I want to know how to do this I want it so everytime I kill a npc it gives me like 2k slayer exp does anyone know how to do that? If you could thank, you very much and if you don't and commant ad try to help anyways thanks for that.
